title: Sexism in advertising in the U.S. 2016
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Share of..., and Unnamed: 1 in each Share of... on the y axis.

The Unnamed: 1 is highest at Share of... ...respondents who have seen ads that portay women as dumb helpless or incompetent and lowest at Share of... ...respondents who have seen advertising they deem "offensive" to women.

The maximum Unnamed: 1 85.0 is found at Share of... ...respondents who have seen ads that portay women as dumb helpless or incompetent and the minimum is found at ...respondents who have seen advertising they deem "offensive" to women where Share of... is 76.0.
The second highest Unnamed: 1 is appeared to be the Share of... ...female respondents who have been offended by sexism in advertising.

There is a difference of 9.0 between the maximum Share of... ...respondents who have seen ads that portay women as dumb helpless or incompetent and minimum Share of... ...respondents who have seen advertising they deem "offensive" to women.

The Share of... ...respondents who have seen ads that portay women as dumb helpless or incompetent has the highest Unnamed: 1, followed by ...female respondents who have been offended by sexism in advertising, and ...respondents who have seen ads they find ridiculous in how they portray women. Down to the Share of... ...respondents who have seen advertising they deem "offensive" to women which is the lowest.
